## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## user-specific files

# Build results
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# ASP.NET files
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
.vs/

# Rider (JetBrains IDE)
.idea/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuspec
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# .NET Core
project.assets.json
project.*.json
*.deps.json

# Entity Framework stuff
migrations/

# Others
*.log
*.tlog
*.cache
*.bak
*.tmp
*.pidb
*.svclog

# Don't check in your secrets
secrets.json
appsettings.Development.json

# Mac files
.DS_Store

# Windows image thumbs
Thumbs.db

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Extra backup files
*.orig
*.bak

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

# Coverlet code coverage
coverage*.json
coverage*.xml
coverage*.info
